title: Implement todo data model and storage
details: Create JavaScript modules for the todo data model and localStorage persistence. Each todo should have id, text, completed status, and created timestamp.
acceptance_criteria: Todo class/factory with id, text, completed, createdAt properties
Storage module with save, load, update, delete methods
Handle edge cases like corrupted storage data
Export clean interfaces for use by other modules
test_strategy: Unit tests for model creation, storage CRUD operations, and localStorage interaction
